INSERT INTO member (U_ID, U_PWD, U_NAME, U_ADR, U_ADRCODE, U_TEL, U_MAIL, JOINWAIT, S_FILE) VALUES (#{u_id}, #{u_pwd}, #{u_name}, #{u_adr}, #{u_adrcode}, #{u_tel}, #{u_mail}, 'Y', #{s_file})
